dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.workingOnDashboard: We're working on a personalized dashboard for your role. Check back soon for updates!

admin.title: Attendance Management Dashboard
admin.description: Manage school-wide attendance with advanced tracking methods

teacher.title: Class Attendance Tracker
teacher.description: Mark and monitor attendance for your classes

student.title: Your Attendance Portal
student.description: Check in and view your attendance records

qrCode.title: QR Code Check-in
qrCode.description: Scan the classroom QR code to mark attendance

location.title: Location Check-in
location.description: Automatic attendance when you enter campus

bulkUpload.title: Bulk Upload Attendance
bulkUpload.description: Upload attendance records in bulk from CSV or Excel files

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.description: Follow these steps to bulk upload attendance records
instructions.step1: Download the template file using the button below
instructions.step2: Fill in the attendance data following the format in the template
instructions.step3: Save the file as CSV or Excel format
instructions.step4: Upload the completed file using the upload section
instructions.step5: Review the upload results and fix any errors if needed

template.title: Download Template
template.description: Get a pre-formatted template to fill in attendance data

upload.title: Upload Attendance File
upload.description: Select and upload your completed attendance file
upload.invalidType: Invalid file type. Please upload a CSV or Excel file.

recentUploads.title: Recent Bulk Uploads
recentUploads.description: History of your recent bulk attendance uploads

summary.title: Current Attendance Summary
summary.description: Overall attendance statistics after bulk uploads

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.description: You do not have permission to bulk upload attendance records.

subjects.title: Subjects
subjects.description: Manage academic subjects and their departments

announcements.title: Announcements
announcements.description: Create and manage announcements for your school
announcements.publishImmediatelyDescription: Make this announcement visible to users right away
announcements.createNewAnnouncement: Create a new announcement for your school

exams.title: Examination Management
exams.description: Comprehensive exam management system with question banks, auto-generation, marking, and results
exams.subject: Subject

dashboard.title: Examination Management
dashboard.description: Comprehensive exam management system with question banks, auto-generation, marking, and results

manage.title: Exam Management
manage.description: Schedule, organize, and oversee all examinations
manage.details: Create exams, set schedules, define marks, and manage exam lifecycle from draft to completion.

qbank.title: Question Bank
qbank.description: Build and manage your repository of questions
qbank.details: Store questions with metadata, difficulty levels, Bloom taxonomy, and topic tags for reuse.

generate.title: Auto Generation
generate.details: Generate exams from templates or let AI create questions based on curriculum and difficulty.

mark.title: Auto Marking
mark.details: Grade MCQs automatically, use rubrics for essays, and leverage AI for subjective answers.

results.title: Results & Reports
results.details: Calculate grades, generate PDF reports, analyze performance, and export results.

workflow.title: Exam Workflow Guide
workflow.description: Follow these steps for a complete exam lifecycle

step1.title: Build Question Bank
step1.description: Add questions manually or use AI generation. Tag with topics, difficulty, and Bloom levels.

step2.title: Create Exam
step2.description: Use templates or generate from question bank. Set schedule, duration, and marks distribution.

step3.title: Conduct Exam
step3.description: Publish exam to students. Monitor progress and attendance during exam period.

step4.title: Grade & Mark
step4.description: Auto-grade MCQs, use rubrics for essays, and AI assistance for subjective answers.

step5.title: Generate Results
step5.description: Calculate final marks, assign grades, generate PDF reports, and analyze performance metrics.

qbank.question: Question
qbank.aiDescription: Use AI to automatically generate questions
qbank.aiCapabilities: AI can generate questions based on curriculum and difficulty
qbank.aiGenerateCaption: Use AI to automatically generate questions based on curriculum and difficulty level
qbank.addDescription: Add a new question to the question bank

events.title: Events
events.description: Schedule and manage your school events

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your school settings, users, roles, and permissions
settings.appearanceDescription: Customize your platform appearance with beautiful preset themes or create your own.
settings.presetThemesDescription: Choose from our curated collection of beautiful themes. Click on any theme to apply it instantly.
settings.customThemeBuilderDescription: Create your own custom theme by adjusting colors, typography, and spacing.
settings.customThemeBuilderComingSoon: Advanced theme customization coming soon. For now, you can import/export themes or use our preset collection.
settings.themeFormatDescription: Themes are exported as JSON files containing all color, spacing, and typography configurations.
settings.downloadAllData: Download all school data in CSV/Excel format
settings.clearBrowserCache: Clear browser cache and temporary data
settings.useKeyToAuthenticate: Use this key to authenticate API requests
settings.configureWebhooks: Configure webhook endpoints for real-time events
settings.irreversibleActions: These actions are irreversible. Please proceed with caution.
settings.deleteAllData: Delete all school data and start fresh
settings.permanentlyDelete: Permanently delete this school and all associated data

userManagementLabels.createUserDesc: Create a new user account and assign a role
userManagementLabels.developerModeDesc: You have full access to all features and can manage all user roles. This mode is for testing and development only.
userManagementLabels.manageUsersDesc: Manage user accounts, assign roles, and control permissions
userManagementLabels.viewManagePermissions: View and manage permissions for each role
userManagementLabels.deleteConfirmDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the user account and remove all associated data.

notificationSettings.title: Notification Settings
notificationSettings.configureSms: Configure SMS notification preferences for critical alerts
notificationSettings.smsCharges: SMS notifications may incur additional charges
notificationSettings.setQuietHours: Set quiet hours to pause non-critical notifications
notificationSettings.emergenciesNote: Critical alerts will still be sent during quiet hours

permissionsPanel.title: Permissions Management
permissionsPanel.description: Manage role-based permissions and access control
permissionsPanel.selectRole: Select a role to view and manage permissions
permissionsPanel.noPermissions: No permissions enabled for this role
permissionsPanel.modifyAllRoles: You can modify all role permissions. Changes affect all users with these roles.
permissionsPanel.configurePermissions: Configure permissions for each role in the system
permissionsPanel.developerFullAccess: Developers have full system access by default. This cannot be modified.
permissionsPanel.overviewAllRoles: Overview of permissions across all roles

roleSwitcher.title: Role Switcher
roleSwitcher.description: Switch between different roles to test dashboard views and features
roleSwitcher.enableDeveloperMode: Enable developer mode to access all roles and features for testing
roleSwitcher.accessNote: This will give you access to all system roles and permissions
roleSwitcher.switchNote: You can now switch between all roles to test different dashboard views and features. Changes are temporary and for testing purposes only.
roleSwitcher.limitedAccessNote: Enable Developer Mode or have Admin/Developer role to switch between roles.
roleSwitcher.compareRoles: Compare features and permissions across different roles

errors.settingsError: An error occurred while loading the settings page. Please try refreshing the page.

onboarding.title: School Setup
onboarding.letsGetStarted: Let's get your school set up
onboarding.createNewSchoolDescription: Start from scratch with basic setup
onboarding.aboutSchoolDescription: In this step, we'll ask you about your school type, location, and student capacity. Then we'll help you set up your academic structure.
onboarding.schoolNameDescription: This will be your school's official name in the system.
onboarding.schoolDescriptionPlaceholder: Tell us about your school's mission, values, and what makes it special...
onboarding.whatMakesYourSchoolUnique: What makes your school stand out?
onboarding.uniqueFeaturesDescription: Tell us about the unique features and strengths of your school.
onboarding.howManyStudents: How many students can your school accommodate?
onboarding.importExistingData: Import existing student and teacher data
onboarding.reviewAndFinish: Review and finish your school setup
onboarding.joinPageDescription: You can change this at any time.
onboarding.inviteWithCodesDescription: Generate invitation codes that teachers, staff, students and parents can use to self-register. You can review and finalizing.
onboarding.manualEnrollmentDescription: Add all teachers, staff, and students yourself through the admin panel.
onboarding.visibilityPageDescription: This determines what information is shared with parents and students.
onboarding.fullTransparencyDescription: Share attendance reports, announcements, and academic progress with all relevant parties.
onboarding.limitedSharingDescription: Share only essential information and require approval for detailed reports.
onboarding.pricePageDescription: This will be the annual tuition fee for your school. You can change this later in your school settings.
onboarding.addDiscountsSubtitle: Attract more families and fill your enrollment faster with these promotional offers.
onboarding.newFamilyPromotionDescription: Offer 20% off first semester for new student enrollments
onboarding.operationalStatus: What is your school's operational status?
onboarding.schoolSafetyFeatures: Does your school have any of these?
onboarding.complianceNotice: Be sure to comply with your
onboarding.acceptTerms: I accept the terms and conditions
onboarding.schoolAvailableAt: Your school will be available at:
onboarding.selectSchoolTypeDescription: Select the type that best describes your school's educational approach and governance structure.
onboarding.schoolLocationDescription: Your school's address will be visible to parents and staff members.
onboarding.whatMakesYourSchoolUnique: What makes your school stand out?
onboarding.uniqueFeaturesDescription: Tell us about the unique features, programs, and qualities that make your school special.
onboarding.capacityDescription: Tell us about your school's capacity and facilities.
onboarding.supportedFileTypes: pdf, xlsx, xls, csv, docx, doc
onboarding.brandingDescription: Upload your logo and customize your school's visual style.
onboarding.finishSetupDescription: Review your school setup and complete the onboarding process.
onboarding.setupComplete: Your school setup is almost complete!
onboarding.clickNextToFinish: Click next to finish and go to your dashboard.

overview.title:
It's easy to get started
on Hogwarts

step1.title: Tell us about your school
step1.description: Share some basic info, like where it is, and how many students it has.

step2.title: Add people and data
step2.description: Invite staff, and import students and classes—we'll help you out.

step3.title: Set up and launch
step3.description: Configure timetable and attendance, publish announcements, and go live.
